Text:
If the audio is too quiet for you, then download AC3Filter (freeware), and raise the "Master Gain" This is a common problem with AC3 audio on computers.

http://ac3filter.net/projects/ac3filter
Hm.  And here I thought this movie was about Tom Cruise the globe-trotting IMF operative.

Great fanedit, love the original WITH tom cruise in it, loved this version even more...
thanx...

and thanx for the up
